task_text: [Public Health Policy][Summarization] Summarize how the WHO peacekeeping brief addresses operational continuity during the pandemic.

gold_end_state.answer: The WHO peacekeeping brief advises measures to maintain mission continuity: enhanced infection prevention, testing and surveillance tailored to operational settings, isolation and medical evacuation protocols, and contingency planning to preserve critical functions while protecting personnel.

arguments.query: WHO peacekeeping brief operational continuity during COVID-19 pandemic
